title: Truck Diesel Mechanic
full_description: TITLE: Truck / Diesel Mechanic located in Warren MI$1000 Sign ON Bonus... Productivity Bonus....NO weekends! Hours: M-F 8:00 AM to 5:00 PMCandidates for this position must have the skills, training, and certifications necessary to be a fully functioning truck mechanic. Truck Mechanics will operate both in the shop and using mobile repair truck. Candidates must also have tools up to ½', air tools, and impact guns.Position Description:· Will determine vehicle and trailer condition by conducting inspections and diagnostic tests, along with identifying worn and damaged parts needing repair or replacement.· Perform preventive maintenance and repair work necessary on fleet vehicles and trailers including diesel engine system diagnostics.· Fill out vehicle inspection reports and maintenance records.· Ensure compliance with federal and state vehicle repair requirements.POSITION REQUIREMENTS· Certification from a diesel mechanic trade school or a minimum of 5 plus years of related work experience.· Must have own tools including hand tools, impact guns, and other pneumatic tools· Candidates must have a good driving record and valid driver’s license.EOE STATEMENTWe are an equal employment opportunity employer. All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, religion, gender, national origin, disability status, protected veteran status or any other characteristic protected by law.
